title: Octavaian
content:
To my eye the [Paratype Octava](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052916/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/octava/) resembles slightly   
 [Octavian](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052916/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/octavian/). Compare Octavian 72 pt with Octava 60 pt. Even the names just might have something in common?
author: aku_ankkuli

comments.content:
Dear Aku,   
I am sorry, but 'Paratype Octava' and Carter's (Willy) and Kindersley's 'Octavian' are completely different.   
Ciao,   
Fabrizio

AARGH! Total knockout. Now should I take it like a man or soak myself with gasoline and light a match?   
Anyway I insist that in total darkness they look pretty much the same.
Aku, you are a riot. Good Humor
